creditline: The Friends of Bruce Dayton Art Acquisition Fund
description: teardrop-shaped top, with incised similar shape with a vertical line down center at center of blade on each side; ribs on each outer side of shaft with open loop at bottom of each rib; one side at bottom of shaft has an incised design with a standing stick figure holding a yoke across its shoulders with two elements hanging from each side of yoke; mottled patina--greens, reds
title: Spearhead (mao)
